#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int prime[1002];

void init()
{
	int i,j;
	
	
	for(i=0;i<=1000;i++)
	 prime[i]=-1;
	 
	prime[2]=1;
	
	for(i=3;i<=1000;i++)
	{
		if(i%2==0)
		prime[i]=0;
	}
	
	for(i=3;i<=1000;i++)
	{
		if(prime[i]==-1)
		{
			prime[i]=1;
			
			for(j=2*i;j<=1000;j+=i)
			{
				prime[j]=0;
			}
		}
	}
	//cout<<prime[3]<<endl;
}

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	init();
	//cout<<"The prime numbers are\n";
	
	int i;
	//for(i=2;i<=1000;i++)
	 //cout<<" i = "<<i<<" : "<<prime[i]<<endl;
	 
	 int test;
	 cin>>test;
	 while(test--)
	{
		int n,k=29;
		cin>>n;
		
		int sum=0;
		for(i=k;i<=n;i++)
		{
			if(prime[i]==1)
			 sum+=i;
		}
		cout<<sum<<endl;
	} 
	return 0;
}
